channel.title: Comments on: ইসলামের ইতিহাসের সহজ পাঠঃ প্রকৃত ইসলামের সন্ধানে
channel.description: জ্ঞান যেখানে সীমাবদ্ধ, যুক্তি যেখানে আড়ষ্ট, মুক্তি সেখানে অসম্ভব

item.title: By: Mormo Bhedi
item.dc:creator: Mormo Bhedi
item.description: Quran is a philosophically weak and poor book if we compare to Geeta, Shangkhya Dorshon, Upanishada, Bedanta and specially Buddist philosophy(much more materialist and rational compared to other contemporary religious scripts .
item.content:encoded: Quran is a philosophically weak and poor book if we compare to Geeta, Shangkhya Dorshon, Upanishada, Bedanta and specially Buddist philosophy(much more materialist and rational compared to other contemporary religious scripts .
